resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/55010777</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>55010777</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212476</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Texas Instruments Classroom Activities from US and Canada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Texas Instruments Klassenzimmer-Aktivitäten von US
und von Kanada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de salle de classe de Texas Instruments 
des USA et du Canada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades da sala de aula dos instrumentos de 
Texas dos E. U. e do Canadá</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività dell'aula della Texas Instruments dagli 
Stati Uniti e dal Canada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες τάξεων της Texas Instruments από 
τις ΗΠΑ και τον Καναδά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades de la sala de clase de Texas 
Instruments de los E.E.U.U. y de Canadá</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site has teacher-developed activities that incorporate Texas Instrument (TI) technology into the classroom. Links to activities, teacher resources, and supplemental materials are provided. Access to activities is free and a lot of the material is available as pdf downloads.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site hat Aktivitäten Lehrer-entwickelt, die 
Technologie des Texas Instrumentes (TI) in das Klassenzimmer 
enthalten. Links zu den Aktivitäten, zu den 
Lehrerbetriebsmitteln und zu den zusätzlichen Materialien werden zur 
Verfügung gestellt. Zugriff zu den Aktivitäten ist frei und 
eine Menge Material ist als pdf Downloads vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site professeur-a développé les activités qui
incorporent la technologie d'instrument du Texas (TI) à la salle de 
classe. Des liens aux activités, aux ressources de professeur, 
et aux matériaux supplémentaires sont fournis. L'accès aux 
activités est libre et beaucoup du matériel est disponible comme 
téléchargements de pdf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local professor-desenvolveu as atividades que 
incorporam a tecnologia do instrumento de Texas (TI) na sala de aula. 
As ligações às atividades, aos recursos do professor, e aos 
materiais suplementares são fornecidas. O acesso às atividades
está livre e os muitos do material estão disponíveis como downloads
do pdf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo insegnante-ha sviluppato le attività 
che comprendono la tecnologia dello strumento del Texas (TI) 
nell'aula. I collegamenti alle attività, alle risorse 
dell'insegnante ed ai materiali supplementari sono forniti. 
L'accesso alle attività è libero e molto il materiale è 
disponibile come trasferimenti dal sistema centrale verso i satelliti 
del pdf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή δάσκαλος-έχει αναπτύξει τις 
δραστηριότητες που ενσωματώνουν την τεχνολογία οργάνων (TI) του
Τέξας στην τάξη. Οι συνδέσεις με τις δραστηριότητες, τα 
στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς δασκάλων, και τα συμπληρωματικά υλικά 
παρέχονται. Η πρόσβαση στις δραστηριότητες είναι ελεύθερη 
και πολύ υλικό είναι διαθέσιμο καθώς pdf μεταφορτώνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio profesor-ha desarrollado las actividades
que incorporan tecnología del instrumento de Tejas (TI) en la sala de
clase. Las conexiones a las actividades, a los recursos del 
profesor, y a los materiales suplementales se proporcionan. El 
acceso a las actividades está libre y los muchos del material están 
disponibles como transferencias directas del pdf.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:TEXAS INSTRUMENTS INCORPORATED
FN:TEXAS INSTRUMENTS INCORPORATED
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212476</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>55010777</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/texas-instruments-classroom-activities-from-us-and-canada</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
